content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
  
### Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Ensure that you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory to supply the furnaces. Check the status of each furnace to confirm they have the required materials.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities that may occupy the intended tile.
